name: Acasia
special_mechanics: Curse mechanics; every A adds lingering omen

spades.content: Broken milestone on the old Imperial Road; borders 'moved' overnight
The Pale Causeway: the last high road that survives spring thaws

hearts.content: Tithe-collector's runner with tally-rod and empty stomach
The Cursed Child of Silkstrand (a rumor more than a person) whose laughter ends sieges

clubs.content: Peat-fog; all horns sound like someone calling your name
The Curse stirs: no matter the road, you return to the same crossroads

diamonds.content: Curse-redemption rite (temporary): for one night no crossroads can hold you
